aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: MultiMarket is an online marketplace that brings together products for electrical, plumbing, and many other categories. Our goal is to provide you with a convenient, fast, and reliable service.

features.feature1: Wide range of electrical and plumbing products

contactPage.title: Our Contact Information
contactPage.address: Our store: Chorsu Market, Namangan city
contactPage.no_backend: Backend is not available yet. Mock data is being used.
contactPage.mock_admin_response: Hello! We will review your message.

aboutMarket.title: More About MultiMarket
aboutMarket.description: MultiMarket is a leading online platform for electrical and plumbing products, offering high-quality products at affordable prices. Our goal is to provide customers with the ability to easily find suitable products and shop securely.

assortment.title: Wide Assortment
assortment.description: Thousands of products, including electrical equipment (sockets, switches, cables, lights) and plumbing products (pipes, faucets, shower cabins, bathtubs).

suppliers.title: Reliable Suppliers
suppliers.description: Collaboration only with verified suppliers providing high-quality products.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Delivery across Namangan and Uzbekistan within 1–2 hours.

search.title: Convenient Search System
search.description: Ability to filter products by categories, brands, and prices.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Constant support for any questions or issues.

discounts.title: Promotions and Discounts
discounts.description: Regularly updated special offers and discounts, including up to 12% off on purchases over 2,000,000 UZS.

aboutMarket.footer: Shopping with MultiMarket means convenience, quality, and trust! Register today and discover the best offers.

testimonialsData.azizbek: I couldn’t find what I found in MultiMarket anywhere else. Very convenient and reliable!
testimonialsData.muhammad: Prices are great, delivery is fast and hassle-free.
testimonialsData.jamshid: High-quality products and trustworthy sellers! I always shop here.
